const response = await client.search({
  index: "my-index-000001",
  query: {
    script_score: {
      query: {
        bool: {
          filter: {
            term: {
              status: "published",
            },
          },
        },
      },
      script: {
        source: "1 / (1 + l1norm(params.queryVector, 'my_dense_vector'))",
        params: {
          queryVector: [4, 3.4, -0.2],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
